alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:33PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Uintah County through 430 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported a strong thunderstorm near Vernal, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernal. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Utah near mile marker 133, and between mile markers 135 and 147. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 353 and 364. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains
